messages.ssml: <speak>Hi. This is the <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub> Virtual Agent. I can answer questions about COVID-19 based on publicly available information. I'm not a clinician and can't give medical advice, diagnosis or treatment.  If you are experiencing a life threatening emergency, call 911. How can I help?</speak>

richContent.title: Hi. My name is SafeDITO and I'm your virtual assistant for disaster risk management. How can I help?
text: You can ask me questions related to COVID-19. You can also choose from pre-defined options below.
If you are experiencing a life threatening emergency, please call 911. For medical advice, please contact Maxicare (02) 85821980

options.text: How many COVID-19 confirmed cases worldwide?

messages.ssml: <speak>Hi. This is the <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub> Virtual Agent. I can answer questions about COVID-19 based on publicly available information. I'm not a clinician and can't give medical advice, diagnosis or treatment.  If you are experiencing a life threatening emergency, call 911. How can I help?</speak>
messages.displayText: Hi. This is SafeDITO, your virtual assistant for disasters and emergencies. I can answer questions about COVID-19 based on publicly available information. I'm not a clinician and can't give medical advice, diagnosis or treatment.  If you are experiencing a life threatening emergency, call 911  How can I help?
